name: The CSDMS Software Stack
tagline: A CSDMS cookbook of software recipes
body:
### About CSDMS Stack

CSDMS Stack is a GitHub organization that houses `conda` recipes. Each recipe builds a software package, which can be installed with the `conda` command, that together form the complete CSDMS software stack. There are two main types of repositories within the organization, each of which end with `-recipe`:

1. _[model]_-recipe: These are recipes for community-contributed models.
2. _[model]_-csdms-recipe: These are recipes for models that expose a BMI and that have wrapped so as they can be used within the CSDMS modeling framework, pymt.

The built distributions are upload to [anaconda.org/csdms](https://anaconda.org/csdms) and can be [installed with conda](http://conda.pydata.org/docs). For example, to install a `csdms-stack` package into an existing conda environment,

```bash
$ conda config --add channels csdms
$ conda install <package-name>
```
